## Resume (Quick View)

### Summary
Computer science post-bacc graduate with business acumen and interpersonal skills gained through experience in staffing and real estate industries.

### Technologies

- Berklee College of Music — Bachelors Degree in Music Performance (2016)
- School of Video Game Audio — Wwise and C# focus (2020–2021)
- Wwise 301 certified (2021), Wwise 101 certified (2019)

### Experience
**Oak & Vine Property Management** (Dec 2025 – Present)  
Property Manager

**University of Colorado Boulder** (May 2023 – Present)  
Computer Science Post-Baccalaureate Student

**BluFetch (property investment startup)** (June 2024 – Dec 2024)  
Data Pipeline Consultant  
- Built and maintained a web scraper that traversed various county websites collecting property data.  
- Built and maintained a data pipeline to clean/reformat scraped data for usage with APIs (Zillow & Geolocator) and Salesforce ingestion.  
- Dispersed and managed data via Google Sheets for a small team; used AI to write Google Apps Scripts (JavaScript) that retained end-user color-coding through batch updates.

**Onward Play (staffing firm)** (June 2021 – Dec 2022)  
Senior Game Recruiter  
- Met with studio executives and hiring managers to qualify openings.  
- Recruited for roles including graphics programmers, gameplay developers, artists, sound designers, animators, technical directors, etc.  
- Top performing recruiter for the Onward Play division, leading in 2022 YTD GM.  
- Used complex boolean strings and Google Sheets lists to improve sourcing results.

**Pinnacle Group (staffing firm)** (Jan 2017 – Nov 2020)  
IT Recruiter / Account Manager  
- Built rapport across diverse management levels to communicate recruiting efforts daily.  
- Developed surface-level understanding of engineering and business roles to screen candidates.
